eprllib.Env¶

Environments¶

The environments in RLlib can be implemented as a simple-agent, multi-agent or external environment. In eprllib we use a multi-agent aproach, allowing to run multiples agents in the environment, but also a single agent if only one is specify.

The standard configuration use a policy with fully shared parameters, but in the next versions we hope to add flexibility to the policy.

You can configure the environment with the EnvConfig class .

Modules

EnvConfig

Environment Configuration

MultiAgent

Multi-Agent Environment
